properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 4 at 8:09PM PST until February 6 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
10 to 14 feet.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
